# Heyachainedblake

This is a mashup of [Heyawake](https://puzz.link/rules.html?heyawake) and [Chained Block](https://puzz.link/rules.html?chainedb) - the number in each room gives the number of Chained Block blocks in that room. Blocks can not cross over room borders.

Click the image to solve on Penpa+.
[![Click to solve on Penpa+](../../images/puzzles/2023/heyachainedblake1.png)](https://swaroopg92.github.io/penpa-edit/#m=solve&&)
